description:
During class one day, Yamai Ren notices that Komi`s tights have a hole in them. Luckily, Ren has a spare pair to lend her.
Source: Netflix

titles.title: Densen Desu. / Oni ni Kanabou Desu. / Amai Desu. / Kenka Desu.
It`s Just Ripped Tights. / It`s Just an Oni and Her Club. / It`s Just a Pushover. / It`s Just a Fight.
To tylko podarte rajtki. I więcej.
伝線です. / 鬼に金棒です. / 甘いです. / ケンカです.
